description: List material transaction preloads with filtering and pagination.
permissions: User can view preloads for material transactions they are authorized to access via the delegated MaterialTransaction policy scope.
validation_notes: Filters accept comma-separated IDs for --trailer and --material-transaction. Preload timestamp filters require ISO 8601 values.

flags.name: --trailer
flags.description: Filter by trailer ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list accepted for multiple trailer IDs.

flags.name: --material-transaction
flags.description: Filter by material transaction ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list accepted for multiple material transaction IDs.
